## Introduction
This document is a notebook with documentation and code for the LDSF data analysis workshop in Voi (July 9 to 12, 2024).

## Load the libraries we will use 
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
```

## Load data

```{r}
table_ldsf <- read.csv("data/ldsf/ldsf_data_uk-pact.csv")
```

## Data exploration

1. We use dplyr to do some simple grouping and to summarise the data.
2. We pass the summarised data into ggplot2 to create a plot.

### Number of plots by site
```{r}
table_ldsf |>
    group_by(site) |>
    summarise(n = n())
```

```{r}
table_ldsf |>
    group_by(site) |>
    summarise(n = n()) |>
    ggplot() +
    geom_col(aes(x = site, y = n, fill=site))
```

## Erosion
```{r}
table_ldsf |>
    group_by(site, cluster) |>
    summarise(erosion = sum(severeero)) |>
    ggplot() +
    geom_boxplot(aes(x = site, y = erosion)
```
